abstract: Ross Douthat Op-Ed column points out that seeming foreign policy muddle in Middle East is direct result of Obama administration's attempts to move away from system in which United States was dominant in region and managed close network of allies; cautions that problem with this move is that US cannot be so easily disentangled from region and resulting system will be more volatile and dangerous than the one it replaced.
lead_paragraph: Pax Americana is no longer feasible, but its alternative could be even worse.

headline.main: The Method to Obama’s Middle East Mess
headline.print_headline: The Method to Obama’s Middle East Mess

snippet: Pax Americana is no longer feasible, but its alternative could be even worse.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
